description:
A cross-platform GUI for yt-dlp (youtube-dl) made in Tauri and Vue 3


- Best audio quality option (MP3 V0)
- Remembers window size and position
- Tray icon with minimize to tray option
- Optional auto-start on system startup
- Optional notifications for queue progress and completion
- Improved authentication help links
- Fixed destination path detection for remuxed/converted files
- Fixed settings not saving due to shortcut conflicts
- Added missing SponsorBlock category (music_offtopic)
- Improved error handling for failed yt-dlp runs
- App now hides instead of quitting when closing on macOS
